list.name: Releases
list.query: SELECT title, description from annotations WHERE $timeFilter order by time asc
list.rawQuery: select extract(epoch from time) AS time, title as text, description as tags from sannotations where $__timeFilter(time)

panels.description: Current median age of opened PRs.

targets.rawSql:
select
  descr
from
  sprs_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'prs_age[[repogroup]]m'
order by
  time desc
limit 1

panels.title: Current median age of opened PRs in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.description: Current average number of opened PRs.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time, value
from
  sprs_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'prs_age[[repogroup]]n'
order by
  time desc
limit 1

panels.title: Current average number of opened PRs in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.description: Median age and number of pull requests created in [[repogroup]] repository group.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "Average number of PRs opened"
from
  sprs_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'prs_age[[repogroup]]n'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Median age of opened PRs"
from
  sprs_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'prs_age[[repogroup]]m'
order by
  time

panels.title: Number/Age of Pull requests in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.description: Median age and number of pull requests created in [[repogroup]] repository group.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time as "Time",
  descr as "Median opened PRs age"
from
  sprs_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'prs_age[[repogroup]]m'
order by
  time

select
  time as "Time",
  value as "Average number of opened PRs"
from
  sprs_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'prs_age[[repogroup]]n'
order by
  time

panels.title: Number/Age of Pull requests in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.description: Current median age of opened PRs.

targets.rawSql:
select
  descr
from
  spr_age_company
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'pr_age_company[[repogroup]]istopcontributingcompanym'
order by
  time desc
limit 1

panels.title: Current median age of opened PRs in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.title: Number/Age of Pull requests in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

list.label: Repository group
list.name: repogroup_name
list.query: select all_repo_group_name from tall_repo_groups order by 1

list.name: repogroup
list.query: select all_repo_group_value from tall_repo_groups where all_repo_group_name = '[[repogroup_name]]'

list.name: full_name
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'full_name'

current.text:
ChaosMesh PRs age dashboard

Links:

  • Metric SQL file.
  • TSDB series definition. Search for prs_age
  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard shows number of PRs opened in given periods and median age of those PRs.
  • PR age is defined as time from open to either merge or now (for non-merged PRs).
  • You can select single repository group or summary for all of them.
  • Selecting period (for example week) means that dashboard will calculate data in those periods.
  • See here for more informations about periods.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.
current.value:
ChaosMesh PRs age dashboard

Links:

  • Metric SQL file.
  • TSDB series definition. Search for prs_age
  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard shows number of PRs opened in given periods and median age of those PRs.
  • PR age is defined as time from open to either merge or now (for non-merged PRs).
  • You can select single repository group or summary for all of them.
  • Selecting period (for example week) means that dashboard will calculate data in those periods.
  • See here for more informations about periods.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.

list.name: docs
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'prs_age_docs_html'

title: Open PR Age by Repository Group
